data.eml:eml: Vulgarogamasus sphecophilus (Cooreman) comb. nov. (Acari: Mesostigmata: Parasitidae): a redescription and new hymenopteran association

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Baker, Anne S., Foster, Kevin R. (2009): Vulgarogamasus sphecophilus (Cooreman) comb. nov. (Acari: Mesostigmata: Parasitidae): a redescription and new hymenopteran association. Zootaxa 2088: 51-64, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.187435
